summary: Give all classes from Oblivion to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
With the simplicity of using a bat command in the console, you can have all the bliss from oldschool TES games!!

1) Move all .txt files to Skyrim/Data.
2) Open the console ingame.
3) Type \"bat (the class you want).
        ex: \"bat battlemage\"
4) Watch the magic happen!

Have an idea for a mod including bat files? Let me know! I\'ll give it my all!
author: ndisario95
